website_summaries.verdict: A value-sized bag by a trusted dog treat manufacturer – the best value for dog owners who want to get the most for their money.
pros: Peanut Butter & Oats is featured although a variety of flavors including salmon, pork, rabbit, chicken and duck are available
Contains wholesome ingredients and quality protein with no wheat, corn, or soy
cons: They are small especially for large dogs, but the size is ideal for training

website_summaries.verdict: A solid deal not only for the price and the quantity, but for providing a sampling of the numerous treat flavor options that Zuke's has to offer.
pros: A variety pack that includes Zuke's popular flavors: pork, salmon, rabbit, peanut butter, chicken, and duck
It's also a good deal – you get 6 packs totaling 36 ounces
cons: Some of the packages contained treats that didn't seem as fresh as others

customer_reviews.title: MOLD
customer_reviews.text: Order the multi pack as have in past....opened the pork and had a very disgusting odor....upon checking was extremely molded❗️ Have since opened the Peanut Butter Bag and it is ok. Was not able to get bag replaced.....very upset as I had given some of these to my dog before finding the mold!
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Zuke's RULE!
customer_reviews.text: Dogs go crazy for these! And I mean koo koo for coco puffs! My guys like the pork the best but they're ALL good (not that I've tasted them). lol They're made very well and are the perfect size for training treats and don't have a lot of calories. They're a bit pricey but they're made in the USA (not China!) so they're safe for your dog. DO NOT buy ANY kind of treats made in China, especially, but in any other foreign country either, if you don't already know that! Yup. Zuke's are da bomb! Even my cat likes them!
customer_reviews.author: cheetocheeto

customer_reviews.title: Zuke's are usually excellent for training my pup
customer_reviews.text: Zuke's are usually excellent for training my pup, but these were totally dried out and rock-hard when I got them. (They're supposed to be soft, so I'm assuming they were stale too - my dog didn't seem to like them much.) Probably an issue with the shipment or the seller. The product generally is excellent - but I'll be buying treats in-store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Elise L.

customer_reviews.title: We love Zukes Mini treats
customer_reviews.text: We love Zukes Mini treats! They are perfect for training and for fun! They are a perfect size- they work for our Brittany Spaniel and Golden Retriever. Our dogs will do anything for these treats- they really love all of the flavors! I also love the variety pack so we can rotate flavors so our dogs don't get bored with the treats. As a bonus, these treats are usually very well priced on Amazon. The only con to these treats is that they can be a bit smelly; however, I do not think it is bad enough to outweigh the pros!
customer_reviews.author: LynnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Training Treats
customer_reviews.text: Great treats. Smell strong, but not obnoxious. Started training with pieces of food. Puppy did not respond well. Switched to Zuke's. Bonnie will do almost anything to get one. She is a young Rat Terrier puppy. Treats are large enough to cut in half if you are giving many rewards.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Sims

customer_reviews.title: Flavor variety makes training fun!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea you could buy packs with all of the different flavors, I've been buying bulk orders of single flavors and trying to collect all of the flavors, this listing really saves me so much work! Dog training is more exciting for dogs if you have a variety of treats, that can include shape and texture but flavors are also awfully fun for them! Looking forward to having more fun with the pups!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I do training review with my furbaby nearly everyday and keep these bags in rotation so she can have a different flavor everyday. She loves them all and I can give her a whole handful of them (one at a time, of course) for a convenient training session. Zukes has always been the best, but this variety pack is awesome. "Woof, wooooof!" See? My furbaby thinks so too!
customer_reviews.author: Lady Socrates

customer_reviews.title: Crack for dogs
customer_reviews.text: These treats have tamed my terrier. The little dude has a very strong will and likes to do what he wants when he wants. Walks take upwards of an hour because he likes to sit and people watch. It's impossible to make him move. I keep these in my pocket and they work so well as an enticement to keep walking, that he's like a new dog. He LOVES Zukes! Actually, "love" is an understatement. As I sit here, he is pawing at the empty pocket totally bonkers for just the smell.
customer_reviews.author: gratefulreceiver

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them and good for dogs with sensitive tummy’s 🐶
customer_reviews.text: This a favorite dog treat of my dog and others in the neighborhood. It’s small size is perfect for my Maltese. My dog will do just about anything for these treats. (He knows more tricks than a intelligent golden we used to have). My neighbors dog has a sensitive stomach & she has no issues with it. I go back to buying these treats on a regular basis!
customer_reviews.author: Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Bite size for pocket
customer_reviews.text: Love Zukes Mini's for training my dogs, easy to carry in my pocket, don't crumble, and come in a lot of different flavors, so the dogs do not get bored. Small bites, so they do not fill up on them during training sessions. BEST of all - MADE IN THE USA!
customer_reviews.author: run2it

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: These are a great deal and perfect for training. My only negative is that they dry out SUPER fast. We have a treat drawstring bag for training and we usually leave 20-30 treats in it. With this product we could not because the treats dry out in less than 24 hours. they are all a little different consistencies and I don't know if this is due to different flavors or some of the bags are older than others?
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Treat, 0 Star Increase in Price!
customer_reviews.text: Both my Yorkies love these! They are small, at 3 calories each, so I don't feel guilty giving them when training or praising them for a command well done. I freeze what I don't use, so they remain fresh. I do notice,however, they cost considerably more than I paid originally. Which means I may find another source..5 stars for product, no stars for 10.00 increase in price!
customer_reviews.author: wilsonsweb

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!! Great Value!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a DEAL!!!! I love that several of these have Turmeric in them. She loved the treats that was getting bad press for artificial colors & Gawd knows what else! But due to that I went looking for something more healthier & found some of these in a large pet store. At $6+ a pop. Get these, they're much cheaper & you get a Variety of flavors!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: When I opened the bag it was just what I ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the bag it was just what I wanted, a soft little treat for training. Unfortunately, leaving the treats in a treat bag makes them hard little pellets the dog has a hard time chewing. My pup started coughing and the pellet came flying out, so I'll look for a different treat to train. Another reviewer suggests putting the ziplock Zuke bag into another ziplock bag to keep them moist once the original bag is opened.
customer_reviews.author: RenoRedhead

customer_reviews.title: Not always the flavors listed...
customer_reviews.text: These are great treats for my Yorkie. We were using them before we found the 6 pack here on Amazon. I have ordered them twice now and whoever 'prepackaged' the bundle failed. We got 2 chicken & NO peanut butter. I know, not really a big deal, they are dog treats for goodness sake... but my dog likes the peanut butter ones best. She can pick them out of a mixture (we did a little experiment) & we were sad that our latest package was missing the PB. Sad dog... unhappy owner.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Treats!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these treats! I put them in their treat toys and snuffle mats and they entertain themselves searching for these treats! I like the variety of flavors—it keeps my dogs from getting bored with the same old flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for obedience training
customer_reviews.text: All of the Zuke's Mini treats are great for training since they're healthy and dogs love the flavors. Chewy treats are better than time-consuming crunchy treats. Made in the USA is an important factor in my choice of dog treats.
customer_reviews.author: ALH

customer_reviews.title: Bruce loves them
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them. When I take Bruce to the vet they have some really nice treats that most of the dogs seem to love but Bruce just drops them. He likes all the flavors of these treats. He doesn't go for the peanut butter as fast as the others but these have been great for training. I'll have to wait a while to reorder as because of their size I don't go through them as fast as most treats. So they're a little small but their his favorites so they clearly have the best flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: These must be really something!
customer_reviews.text: Although I did not taste test to know about the flavor, my dog goes nuts when she sees me touch the bag. All flavors of Duke's have the same effect. She does not act this way with other treats. Since using these as training tools, she has conquered sit, stay, down, fetch, and stop (for barking). I am truly impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Pat Stringer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love these and are AMAZING for training
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these and are AMAZING for training! :D Bought this pack to keep a bag handy in my car, house, and my workplace. It's grain free so it's easily digestible for my dog's sensitive tummy. He isn't a picky eater so can't really say that he prefers these treats over anything else but as long as he's happy, I'm happy. Mind you the treats do tend to dry out even tho they're kept in these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: My dogs will do anythng for these treats! Great motivator, training tool and for treat balls.
customer_reviews.text: Both our Havanese love these. I bought a treat ball for the dogs and there were no measurements listed for the openings inside where the treats go. Luckily, one of the reviewers for THAT item mentioned she used these for it so I ordered some of these as well. They work perfectly but more importantly, the dogs LOVE them! Our bank always give them a milkbone and it's embarrassing. They'll take it in their mouth and then immediately drop them. Never could happen with these little gems. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allison62

customer_reviews.title: Kid's favorite treat
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids love the Zuke's brand treats. They can each sniff out an opened bag of these wherever it may be hidden in the house. This multi-pack is by far one of the best things I have ever purchased from Amazon. The individual packets for the flavor varieties is fantastic & is the best way to keep treats long lasting in the house without them going stale. Will be re-ordering when it's time for more goodies.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Loved by the dog and the owner
customer_reviews.text: I am a repeat purchaser of this product. The value of these treats are amazing for the price you pay. If you need to buy treats for your dog, buy these. One bag goes away too quick. These are stinky enough to get my dogs attention, even outside. She loves them. They always arrive fresh, and will stay fresh for weeks if put in an airtight container. It's also great that they are all different flavors, as it keeps my dog guessing each time she gets a treat. Wonderful product! Happy mom and happy pup.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Yes yes yes
customer_reviews.text: I have a whiner mix and don’t like regular store treats because I feel it’s to much for my little dog. These treats are little and rewarding! I tried them on over 5 different dogs and they all liked them. Also great for training!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mini

customer_reviews.title: Dreadful packaging!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. But the so-called "zip-lock" packaging is dreadful. These bags simply will not close unless you are prepared to dedicate several minutes to trying to close them and willing to meditate for 30 minutes before and after to clear your head of the frustration they cause. Opening the bag (if you managed to get it closed) is not all that much better. Will not be buying these again until the packaging is made more friendly. Life's too short to waste time trying to open and close these bags.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for daily training and last a long time
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these treats for my dogs. They're both smaller (22 and 28 pounds) and these are great for daily training since they're tiny and won't pack on the extra calories. This is also a great price for 6 bags! As long as the bags are sealed tightly, they last me 4-5 months without drying out once opened (if they're not sealed, they dry out and last about a week). A 6-oz bag will last me a really long time, probably 4 weeks at 6-8 treats per dog per day.
customer_reviews.author: A. Anne

customer_reviews.title: A variety of little-bitty treats!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled to find these! Our mini poodle loves them! I'm tired of breaking up those big treats offered by most sellers,: Hey! Many of us have SMALL dogs! BTW: I got the 6 packets of different flavors so our poodle can enjoy lots of variety. She sure deserves it, since she gives us so much affection and joy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Signell

customer_reviews.title: Zuke's is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: We have a German Shepherd that was getting tired of his regular training treats. These are great because they come in 6 different flavors, all of which he loves. He goes nuts over the salmon and the duck treats. Zuke's is a wonderful, pet friendly company that only uses natural ingredients. I love all of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie TaylorTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: All were a bit but one flavor.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves all the flavors except for the peanut butter. I got a look like, "You expect me to eat p & j? Are you nuts?". All of the other flavors are a bit.
customer_reviews.author: CORGI MOM

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Zukes are fabulous. My golden is really a pig asking for treats all the time. Zukes minis are do small I can give him one at a time and give it frequently. They are made in the USA which is a must for me. My golden likes all the flavors. Price wise you are better off with one flavor and a one pound bag, less expensive but if you want gifts or to try different flavors this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great treats, but may not be perfect for all dog needs
customer_reviews.text: I love these treats for my dog! He's a 70 lb labrador so I was a little skeptical in thinking these would be too small for him. I would say that for bigger dogs like mine, they are best for training or just a small treat. I probably wouldn't recommend for dogs that are eager and snap for treats, since they are so small. They are perfect for training or for placing in dog puzzle toys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: jme03

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training
customer_reviews.text: Zuke's are among my dog, Oscar's favorite treats. I love the random multi-pack because it keeps him from getting used to a flavor. Being able to change from one flavor to the next seems to keep him interested in training. His favorite is the peanut butter, but he likes all of them!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain_Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Beagle Food? Mine loves these
customer_reviews.text: My beagle loves these. Since he wants to hunt when we let him out we give him a treat when he responds to our call to come into the house. They last a long time and smell great. He loves them and is eager to obey knowing he will get a treat for a proper response.
customer_reviews.author: It is a wonderful day!

customer_reviews.title: Great training treat with an awesome variety!
customer_reviews.text: These training treats are the best! They are small enough to carry for walk training and they keep your dog wanting more. I like this variety pack so that I can change it up each day where she doesn’t get tired of one flavor, keeping her from losing interest in training.
customer_reviews.author: Kell629

customer_reviews.title: pups haven't gotten sick like some reviews said
customer_reviews.text: I believe I could train the pups to wash the dishes, pay the bills and drive the kids to school with these treats. They are at full attention when the bag is opened. Mine were all soft and very stinky... pups haven't gotten sick like some reviews said. Package came with 6 nice size bags, a lot of treats. I was expecting small sample sized bags so I feel like it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: shaneadams

customer_reviews.title: Just like the other reviews have said
customer_reviews.text: My Dog LOVES these treats!!! Just like the other reviews have said...these are like crack for dogs! I once kept some in my jacket pocket to give my dog on a walk... I left the jacket on the sofa with pockets empty... and the next time I wore it... I found that he had chewed up that particular pocket because of the smell of these treats that were left behind!!! My dog never chews or rips up anything! Thats how much he loves these treats! Since then.. I only keep these treats in the bag it comes in or in a treat bag that I purchased. Haven't had any issues of the treats drying out or anything.
customer_reviews.author: itzmeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I find this is the perfect size to carry in my pocket for the rare occasions when my Shih Tzu behaves herself (but Annie is still a puppy and I am maintaining a positive attitude.) I tried the Tiny ones but they dry out very quickly when out of the sealed package.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loved the rabbit best.
customer_reviews.text: Rabbit was our puppy’s favorite flavor. I personally can’t judge the flavor or scent LOL but our puppy liked them all.
customer_reviews.author: larsenm

customer_reviews.title: Six delicious flavors in one
customer_reviews.text: Fatastic! I love that I can easily get six different flavors in one product. My dog loves Zuke's and I use them as toppings on her food, as rewards for getting her nails trimmed., 'just because' she's cute, and everything in between. This was the first time I knew that you could buy a multi-pack on Amazon and I'll be buying this from now on!
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves them - great for training or for rewarding positive behavior
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves them - great for training or for rewarding positive behavior. They dry out quickly if not kept sealed, so just keep that in mind. Otherwise, awesome treats for a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P.

customer_reviews.title: Picky Dog
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not care for the taste, so we passed the Zuke's Treats along to a friend. This would have been the perfect size for training purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah's Grandmother

customer_reviews.title: In general, my dog likes these treats, but ...
customer_reviews.text: In general, my dog likes these treats, but I find the quality to vary greatly from bag to bag, specifically in terms of how moist the treat is. I often hide my dog's pills inside treats, and sometimes these treats are so dry that they disintegrate into crumbs as soon as any pressure is applied to them. So the search continues for another brand that has more consistent quality...
customer_reviews.author: llc77

customer_reviews.title: Perfect puppy training treat
customer_reviews.text: I liked getting the variety pack so my puppy gets different flavors and won’t get sick of them. They are the perfect size for training, we have a 9 week old golden retriever and they have already worked in our training.
customer_reviews.author: K. Vogell

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves these treats
customer_reviews.text: Our dog goes crazy for these treats . He does not distinguish between the flavors, they seem to be all the same to him. Great price ! If you are buying Zukes for your dog, check the prices carefully. This was a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: E Kara

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves these
customer_reviews.text: Great training treats: small, easy to carry, easy to eat, and all the flavors we tried he liked. It's nice to have treats small enough they don't need to be broken up if you are doing an activity that results in a lot of rewards being given
customer_reviews.author: James Dilger

customer_reviews.title: contaminated chicken treats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the variety pack of the Zuke's Mini treats and the chicken bag was moldy and very smelly. I contacted the company and they are requesting the bag to be returned so they can analyze the ingredients, etc. Be wary of anything that smells suspicious when you open it. I'm assuming this happened during the manufacturing as opposed to the seller. All else with the order was satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: And this deal is GREAT bc the first time I tried them I got ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is sooo picky and spoiled and she LOVES these treats- every flavor (not PB so much but DEFINITELY all of the meat owns). And this deal is GREAT bc the first time I tried them I got ONE of these bags for $6.99.... So to get 6 for around $25 is a crazy deal!!!! And trust me, your dog will love these- I cant imagine them not! Great "training" treats also!!!
customer_reviews.author: ExtremeAmazonAddictTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small. Great for training! I think they are a bit salty as our dogs hit the water hard when they have these. Fit perfectly in our treat ball.
customer_reviews.author: Salusia

customer_reviews.title: Whatever Lola wants - Lola gets
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these. As much as I love to support my local businesses, it doesn’t make sense to pay more for the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: All 3 of my dogs love every flavor in it
customer_reviews.text: All 3 of my dogs love every flavor in it. When I opened the package they immediately wanted the duck flavor first so I obliged them by giving them one. I am very happy with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best training/reward treats we have found! just the right size, a little chewy - the dog loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gutterman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Treats!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. My dog is in numerous training classes, including scent work so I needed treats that were small yet pungent. These are great! I ended up dumping all of them into 1 container, shaking it up, and this gave me a variety when I would grab a handful. Definitely recommend and will most likely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Charity T.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves the treats & I love the price!
customer_reviews.text: They are not only great training treats, but they must taste pretty amazing also cause my dog absolutely LOVES them. I usually just buy one bag at a time until I saw this... I was expecting the bags to be super small but I was pleasantly surprised when they arrived! It's nice to now have so many different flavors to spoil my pup with! Definitely would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: ashley lauren | xo

customer_reviews.title: I think they're pretending to Pee just to get the treat
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love these treats they're so good. I'm in the process of potty training to seven-month-old puppies and they pretty much been eating these treats since they've been two months old . They are perfect for little dogs. For that price well worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mcneal

customer_reviews.title: These treats are the perfect moist and small training treat for puppies and/or dogs
customer_reviews.text: These treats are the perfect moist and small training treat for puppies and/or dogs! They don't dry out as fast as other treats that I have used, and my pup loves the smell and taste of them! I also love that they are on the healthier and natural side of nutrition for dogs, without being too expensive!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: My large pup loves every single flavor. He's always ...
customer_reviews.text: My large pup loves every single flavor. He's always been rather apathetic to dog treats (preferring human foods), but his eyes always get VERY wide when we reach for some Zuke's. I use these as a training treat, but I also just carry some around and hand them to strangers to give to him. He's always very affectionate to new friends who give him Zuke's! I will certainly be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: BEL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Training Treats
customer_reviews.text: Great value pack. These are just what I was looking for in a training treat; small, tasty (I have not personally tried them), quality ingredients, low calorie. They keep my dog's attention for an hours worth of training class. I highly recommend these training treats.
customer_reviews.author: cattledog_wrangler

customer_reviews.title: Great mini treats
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these small treats and because they are tiny I don’t feel badly about treating him for good behaviors frequently. I just mix the packages all together in an airtight treat jar. He loves them all.
customer_reviews.author: Deb G

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making these
customer_reviews.text: We use these for training all our pups. Great value and perfect size chew.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Wykes

customer_reviews.title: Mikni Dog Teats
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for training and rewarding good behavior without adding to my dogs daily food intake. Keeps a healthier balance that larger treats.
customer_reviews.author: Mazzie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 month old lab puppy loves these. I break each treat into half or thirds since she is still so little. You can't beat the price, and the smaller packages keep each pretty fresh. Huge help to all the beginning training/obedience/potty training/heeling.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren YoderTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love them!
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Treats weren’t stale. Normal dog treat smell -some flavors worse than others
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love em!
customer_reviews.text: Needed small treats and these are perfect! The dogs find them scrumptious! I ordered a 6 pack and they came right away.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Good training treat!
customer_reviews.text: Great training treat for my small Malshi puppy. I would recommend this as a dog owner of service dog and nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Note the size is only 6 ozs
customer_reviews.text: Not many in this package, I usually buy the 1 lbs size and was shocked by the size and price in this order. Partially my fault but feel the size should have been more noticeable in the ad.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Love Zuke's Minis for dog training.
customer_reviews.text: Love Zuke's Minis for dog training. The minis are the perfect size for a reward treat during dog training. My dog seems to like all the meat based flavors equally. The peanut butter not so much. I've been using these treats for years.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette D Skinner

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these I order them on a regular basis
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these I order them on a regular basis
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect training treats
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome training treats. My Rhodesian Ridgeback loves all of these flavors. Perfect size for the trail or in the house and they won't crumble or fall apart. We keep the bag zipped up and we've had no issue of them being stale or drying out. (probably because our dog runs through them so fast). We went through multiple other treat options but are sticking with these from here on out. Great product, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Treats went bad and got hard as rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because these are very dry and hard now. I opened up a pack for my little guy the other day after making sure to store it in a dry dark place like the back of my kitchen cabinet, and hard as rocks even though expiration date isn't until next year of May 2018:(
customer_reviews.author: Baileys Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great treats for training or treat
customer_reviews.text: Excellent treats for training or just a treat. Low calorie but seemingly with a ton of flavor as both our dogs love them! Gluten and wheat free. Definitely make sure to close the bags properly though as they will harden exposed to air for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Andy U

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy did not love these treats. Will look for another treat.
customer_reviews.author: ACW

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates them all
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. My dog spits all of these out. I can't even give them away.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mastey

customer_reviews.title: Great training treats!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves these and the variation is a big plus!
customer_reviews.author: computergeek 89

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training tool!!
customer_reviews.text: Our three year old lab mix was never really into treats and very difficult to train until someone recommended these Zuke’s Treats. She goes nuts for them and has been so easy to train since these were delivered!!
customer_reviews.author: Samm

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what has happened to this brand. Used to love them, but every one of the almost dozen different bags I have ordered has been hard as a rock upon receiving, you can feel how hard they are through the packaging. And it's each and every flavor...so it's not just a "bad batch". Such a shame...I really liked them for my puppies. Guess I will have to find a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: Made in the USA & tasty, small treat
customer_reviews.text: These are made in the USA, and my dog (pug) loves all of these treats. I use them as his reward for when he goes potty outside. I don't worry about the calories too much since they are so small. And buying the six pack is a much better deal than buying the single bags alone.
customer_reviews.author: Kryssy

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them
customer_reviews.text: I got the mixed pack so I could figure out which flavor is the most rewarding for my dog. Turns out that she loves them all equally.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Like the treats enough
customer_reviews.text: Like the treats enough. The small bags don't have as many treats in them as I hoped but I only bought it as a sample. One thing I don't like is how much gas my dogs have after eating these treats. They have tried a number of treats and have never had a problem with gas before. It is so bad right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small dog treat
customer_reviews.text: Our two small dogs absolutely love this product, all flavors.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fields

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Treats
customer_reviews.text: Our Yorkies love these! They’re the perfect size. They love all the flavors. Chicken is a real favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Katie & Evan

customer_reviews.title: Must have treat for your fur baby
customer_reviews.text: My pup has been enjoying these since I discovered Zuke's over two years ago. Love the healthy and natural ingredients and my doggy can't get enough of these treats.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Training go-to!
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to training treats for my dogs. They are bite sized and easy to chew so we can move through the training and stay focused. I love this variety pack to switch things up a bit (Love spoiling my pooches). Great quality and good price!
customer_reviews.author: Gaygot

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE THE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: i WAS SUPPOSED TO RECEIVE 6 PACKETS.... WE ONLY GOT FOUR. I HAVE COMPLAINED THREE TIMES AND STILL NOR GOT ANY RESULTS. WE LOVE THE PRODUCT, BUT NOT HAPPY WITH NOT RECEIVING THE TOTAL NUMBER OF PACKETS. CAN YOU HELP REPORT THIS?
customer_reviews.author: ron cook

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these...
customer_reviews.text: I haved used Zukes as training treats for my two previous dogs as well as my current one, and they all loved them. They are the perfect size for putting in interactive toys, too. Dogs seem to like the variety of flavors, and i trust the brand.
customer_reviews.author: dbrussell

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm training a puppy, and he loves these. They're available here at quite a discount from the local pet store. I'm happy they're made in USA, and they're fresh: the expiration date is quite far out. If you're going through a lot of treats, this is a fine deal!
customer_reviews.author: iFrank

customer_reviews.title: great for training
customer_reviews.text: I use these in our obedience class - they are very motivating to my dog and the price is great!!
customer_reviews.author: jessiewalt

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love these!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs love these!! My mom's dog has very bad allergies and can't have normal meat so we give her the salmon and peanut butter. Her dog loves them too. They can't wait to go outside because they know it is treat time. This was our second order on variety pack. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Jeneda

customer_reviews.title: My pooches love them! All flavors
customer_reviews.text: My pooches love them! All flavors, thus far. This is my treat of choice for them, and this variety pack lasts a couple months and offers different options/flavors for them, all in one. They're economical and convenient, especially ordering through Amazon. They come in a couple of days, and I don't have to leave my home.
customer_reviews.author: Chariss

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended! Especially for training purposes!
customer_reviews.text: These dog treats are wonderful! They were recommended by our dog trainer and the portions are perfect ( I have large hyper dogs, who we must train with frequently), these treats are made in the US, have good ingredients, have many different flavors and most importantly my dogs love them! I am very happy to have found such a good deal on them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves all the flavors. A great purchase for his obedience training
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Always Zuke's
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a of treats, but Zuke's always wins. I love the 6-pack with all the flavors! It's great they're small and very few calories. They tend to dry out fast, so don't forget to zip the bag (and your treat bag) shut.
customer_reviews.author: Tina H.

customer_reviews.title: Staple for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for training. Perfect for play in a treat ball. These are the only treats I buy for my dog, and I buy them in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: kcd

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff III
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love these. They have "delicate" stomachs, and they digest these well. Made in the USA gives me confidence of good quality and an accurate ingredients list. These are their "super special" treat for after their most "successful" walks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves them.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves them. (He loves everything that is edible, and even some things that are not.) Perfect size for training treats!
customer_reviews.author: Panda BearTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These are definitely her high valued treats and have been great for training
customer_reviews.text: Our Border Collie mix absolutely loves these treats! These are definitely her high valued treats and have been great for training. We alternate these with regular kibble to space them out. She loves the rabbit and duck and when these are out she goes crazy! These have less salt than the previous treats we were using but we still ensure she has lots of water available during high volume treat consumption. Made in the USA is always great!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Uniacke

customer_reviews.title: I always keep this on hand as little motivators for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: I always keep this on hand as little motivators for my dogs. They love them and I can feel good about training and treating with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Clark

customer_reviews.title: Quality treats, will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Quality treats, my dog LOVES them. Will buy again. I like the multipack.
customer_reviews.author: A M

customer_reviews.title: Great dog treats
customer_reviews.text: Zukes are great training treats. My dog loves them. These are small sample bags of several flavors. They arrived well packaged and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Best treats for us
customer_reviews.text: Love the Zuke's Mini and my dog loves them too. They are the perfect size for a treat (small), but I also cut them in half for a more robust training session. Have tried various types of treats but these are by far the best for us.
customer_reviews.author: Ran Dotan

customer_reviews.title: Soft and pup loved
customer_reviews.text: Treats are soft, don’t expire until 2020, pup love the first package I opened
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wickesberg

product_meta.title: Zuke's Mini Naturals Healthy Moist Dog Treats Variety Pack - 6 Flavors (Roasted Pork, Wild Rabbit, Roasted Chicken, Delicious Duck, Savory Salmon, & Fresh Peanut Butter) - 6 oz Each (6 Total Pouches) (6 flavors)
product_meta.description:
Size:6 flavorsTake your dog’s training to a tasty new level with healthy and nutritious Mini Naturals from Zuke's. Minis are the ideal size for frequent rewards without overfeeding. At just 3.5 calories each, every moist little morsel is packed full of quality protein, wholefood antioxidants, and a mouthwatering taste.

Dog trainers recommend Mini Naturals – they hold their shape in your pocket or bait bag. Just one delicious little Mini and your dog will be begging to learn all kinds of new tricks.

Feed anytime for a snack or reward.

Zuke's Mini Naturals Healthy Moist Miniature Dog Treat Variety Pack - 6 Great Flavors (6oz Each)

You'll Receive:

- (1) Zuke's Mini Naturals Roasted Pork Flavor
- (1) Zuke's Mini Naturals Wild Rabbit Recipe Flavor
- (1) Zuke's Mini Naturals Delicious Duck Recipe Flavor
- (1) Zuke's Mini Naturals Roasted Chicken Recipe Flavor
- (1) Zuke's Mini Naturals Savory Salmon Recipe Flavor, and
- (1) Zuke's Mini Naturals Fresh Peanut Butter Formula Flavor.
feature_bullets: Zuke's Mini Naturals Variety Pack - 6 Great Flavors (Roasted Pork, Wild Rabbit, Delicious Duck, Roasted Chicken, Savory Salmon, & Fresh Peanut Butter)
Made in the USA with REAL Meat - Free of Wheat, Corn, or Soy - Natural wholefood ingredients packed with antioxidants
With Added Vitamins & Minerals - Less than 3.5 Calories Per Treat
